import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getItems } from '../web3Client' const styles = { item: { flexGrow: '1' }, itemContainer: { display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', margin: '0 10%', }, itemInner: { margin: '10px', backgroundColor: 'red', height: '300px', width: '250px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-between', } } function Home() { const [ items, setItems ] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getItems() .then(data => { console.log(data) const v = data.map(item=>{return
  • item.title
    • }) setItems(v) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }, []) return (
    { items }
    ); } export default Home;
